name: @dadi/queue-wrapper
description: A high-level library for interacting with DADI Queue.

scripts.test: snazzy index.js && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report cobertura --report text --report html --report lcov ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Robert Stanford <rs@dadi.co>
